item.title: CRDO
item.description: score:792 Chances: Announcement of Credo Technology Group Holding’s conference call to discuss financial results for the fiscal first quarter. Credo’s participation in OCP China Day to showcase its HiWire AEC technology. Discussion about share price drop and potential concerns among shareholders. Earnings and revenue surprises reported for the quarter ended April 2023.
